visualization.name: Kepler.gl
visualization.description: Geospatial analysis tool for large-scale data sets
visualization.help:
# What is Kepler.gl Viewer?
Kepler.gl is a powerful tool for exploring and visualizing large-scale geospatial data directly in your browser.
After selecting a dataset (CSV or GeoJSON), you can create interactive maps, apply different layers, and adjust styling to better understand spatial patterns in your data.
## Key Features
- **Map Layers**: Visualize data with various layer types like points, arcs, lines, polygons, and more. - **Custom Styling**: Configure colors, size, radius, and opacity for better insights. - **Filtering**: Filter data by attributes and time ranges for dynamic analysis. - **Animation**: Animate your spatial-temporal data to see changes over time.
This tool is ideal for visualizing GPS tracks, environmental data, urban mobility patterns, and much more.
To learn more about Kepler.gl, visit: [https://kepler.gl/](https://kepler.gl/)
